info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 11:23PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...HEAVY SHOWERS WITH STRONG WINDS WILL WILL IMPACT THE SOUTH FORK OF LONG ISLAND AND SOUTHEASTERN NEW LONDON COUNTY THROUGH 1145 PM EDT... At 1121 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a band of heavy showers with winds up to 50 mph extending from near Plum Island to near Hither Hills State Park to near Montauk Point. Movement was northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Groton, Fishers Island, Mystic, Montauk Point, Hither Hills State Park, Springs, North Stonington, Montauk and Pawcatuck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
